main module¶

main.build_model(train_ds)¶

Build the ML model. Sets up the desired layers and compiles the tf.keres model

Parameters

train_ds – The training dataset used for nomalisation and determining the input_shape

main.load_data(glob)¶

Load the data in the data dir downloaded using make Data is loaded into a tensorflow Data object for improved peformance after a train test split has been made

Parameters

glob (str) – The glob for all the files to load

main.pprint(text)¶

Pretty print

Parameters

text (str) – Text to print

main.preprocess_dataset(files)¶

Process the data. Expand the axis, gets the id (normal/abnormal) and then return the dataset
